name: Spicy Mango Pickle
description: Traditional Andhra style spicy mango pickle made with premium spices. A classic favorite.

name: Lemon Pickle
description: Tangy and spicy lemon pickle aged to perfection. Great for digestion.

description: Rich and flavorful tomato pickle, perfect with rice and dosa.

description: Authentic Gongura (Sorrel leaves) pickle. A spicy and tangy delight.

description: Healthy and tasty Gooseberry (Amla) pickle rich in Vitamin C.

name: Chicken Pickle
description: Boneless chicken pickle made with homemade masala. A non-veg lover's dream.

name: Prawn Pickle
description: Spicy and tangy Prawn pickle made with fresh sea prawns.

name: Mutton Pickle
description: Tender mutton chunks pickled in rich spices. A royal treat.
